title: Coinbase to unleash round-the-clock bitcoin and ether futures trading in U.S.
description: Coinbase to unleash round-the-clock bitcoin and ether futures trading in U.S.

title: Bitcoin magazine hires Galt as a reporter
description: Juan Galt has been hired by Bitcoin Magazine as a reporter. He has been a podcast host for Bitcoin News for the past two years. Galt also been published over the years on Bitcoin Magazine, CoinTelegraph, News.Bitcoin.com, The Coinfront, ElBitcoin.org, BraveNewCoin, and NewsBTC.

title: US SEC to move away from requiring crypto firms to register as trading systems, chief says
description: US SEC to move away from requiring crypto firms to register as trading systems, chief says

title: Crypto day-trader faithful find life under Trump is no paradise
description: Digital assets have been faring particularly poorly, in part due to disappointment that Trump’s industry policies are not living up to expectations.

title: FTC says Americans lost $12.5B to scams last year — social media, AI and crypto didn’t help
description: You’re not the only one getting voicemails about your car’s extended warranty. According to the U.S. Federal Trade Commission (FTC), about 2.6 million people submitted reports on falling victim to fraud in 2024, totaling $12.5 billion in losses.
